<cs> my lords with the leave of the house perhaps i may respond briefly to the points raised by the noble lords lord kilmarnock and lord morton of shuna with the particular scottish dimension <e> <s> i think that it is important for your lordships to understand that there is and has been historically a difference between the ways that these matters have been dealt with in scotland and england <e> <s> to equalise any one element of remuneration would have an adverse effect on the other elements <e> <s> for example the discount scale and the arrangements for dispensing by doctors as there is no rural dispensing committee in scotland would probably require alterations and some of those changes would be detrimental to scottish pharmacists <e> <s> probably there would be no justification for continuing separate negotiations for scotland <e> <s> however i can assure both noble lords that such a change would not have the support of the scottish pharmacists as a whole <e> <s> their representatives have indicated that they would bitterly oppose such a suggestion <e>
<cs> my lords <e> <s> i beg to move that the commons reason and amendments be now considered <e>
<cs> my lords i beg to move that the commons amendments be now considered <e>

<cs> my lords the government have already provided by section of the rating and valuation amendment scotland act the opportunity for certain scottish ratepayers to cite english evidence in valuation appeals an opportunity especially relevant to valuations made under the contractors principle <e> <s> appeals are for the courts and ministers cannot intervene <e>

<cs> my lords as a result of a recent trial we have concluded that the main requirement for the provision of dental appliances should be met by commercial laboratories while a certain number of uniformed dental technicians should be retained to meet an important war role <e> <s> twenty-two civilian dental technicians were therefore informed on th october that they were to be made redundant although special efforts are being made to find them alternative jobs in other specialisations <e>
<cs> my lords i beg to move that the house do now resolve itself into committee on this bill <e>
